REUTERS.UNKNOWN: RM f0378 reute b f BC-QUEBEC-ISSUES-30-BILL 04-08 0077

TEXT.TITLE: QUEBEC ISSUES 30 BILLION YEN EUROBOND
TEXT.BODY: The Province of Quebec is issuing a 30 billion yen eurobond due May 7, 1997 paying five pct and priced at 102-1/2 pct, lead manager Bank of Tokyo International Ltd said. The non-callable bond is available in denominations of one mln yen and will be listed in Luxembourg. The selling concession is 1-1/4 pct, while management and underwriting combined pays 3/4 pct. The payment date is May 7. REUTER
